snippet: The choreographer Molissa Fenley and her colleagues ventured outside their comfort zones in approaching one another for the collaboration “Cross Bridge.”
abstract: Brian Seibert reviews debut of dance piece Cross Bridge, choreographed and performed by Molissa Fenley at the Club at La MaMa.
lead_paragraph: The choreographer Molissa Fenley and her colleagues ventured outside their comfort zones in approaching one another for the collaboration “Cross Bridge.”

headline.seo: Molissa Fenley’s ‘Cross Bridge’ at The Club at La MaMa
headline.main: Steps, Back and Forth, Into a New Comfort Zone
headline.print_headline: Steps, Back and Forth, Into a New Comfort Zone
